text: since i joined i've taken two maternity
leaves and aws really provides a secure
and safe environment for me to feel that
it's okay to expand my family while
growing in my career
[Music]
hi my name is gao xiang i'm the regional
lead for asia pac amazon web services
education to workforce team what we do
here is to educate the next generation
of cloud users and builders i've been
with the company since 2017 i started
off as a program manager to help deploy
and implement aws educate program
education is really close to my heart i
do feel very rewarding when we focus a
lot on nurturing the next generation of
cloud builders especially to offer more
opportunities for women interested in
tech and more importantly getting them
interested in tech in my team i highly
value different people's opinion i
encourage everybody to speak up by doing
just two things number one i make myself
present and available by having open
door policy i encourage everybody to
speak up and number two is that i'm
fully aware of the diversity of my team
across the asia pac region we speak over
2 000 different languages across
different countries different ethnicity
groups indonesia we're currently working
with one of the largest islamic groups
in the country to bring and equip all
the women and girls for the high demand
skills in cloud computing and prepare
them for future careers
we're breaking the barrier to make cloud
computing to be available to everyone
adaws is striving to become earth's best
employer and i'm really excited to be
part of this journey the education to
workforce team invites you to come along
with us to build the future of tech
together
[Music]
